name: laravel/laravel
description: The skeleton application for the Laravel framework.

blueprint:build: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Blueprint\ Build 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Blueprint\ Build 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Blueprint Build' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;34m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
blueprint:trace: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Blueprint\ Trace 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Blueprint\ Trace 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Blueprint Trace' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;34m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
ci:local: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard CI\ Local 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet CI\ Local 2>/dev/null') ?: 'CI Local' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;33m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
dev: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Dev\ Server 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Dev\ Server 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Dev Server' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36;47m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"

bunx concurrently -c "#93c5fd,#c4b5fd,#fb7185,#fdba74" "php artisan serve" "php artisan queue:listen --tries=1" "php artisan pail --timeout=0" "bun run dev" --names=server,queue,logs,vite --kill-others
ide-helper:generate: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard IDE\ Helper 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet IDE\ Helper 2>/dev/null') ?: 'IDE Helper' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;33m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Lint 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Lint 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Lint' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[7;1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:composer: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Composer\ Normalize 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Composer\ Normalize 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Composer Normalize' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:fix: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Fix\ Lint 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Fix\ Lint 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Fix Lint' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;32m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:pint: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Pint 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Pint 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Pint' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;34m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:rector: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Rector 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Rector 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Rector' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;32m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:types:fix:phpstan: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard PHPStan\ Fix 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet PHPStan\ Fix 2>/dev/null') ?: 'PHPStan Fix' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;33m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:types:fix:psalm: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Psalm\ Alter 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Psalm\ Alter 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Psalm Alter' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:types:phpstan: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard PHPStan 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet PHPStan 2>/dev/null') ?: 'PHPStan' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;33m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:types:psalm: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Psalm 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Psalm 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Psalm' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
lint:types:psalm:stats: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Psalm\ Stats 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Psalm\ Stats 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Psalm Stats' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
policy:checksum-monitor: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Policy\ Checksum\ Monitor 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Policy\ Checksum\ Monitor 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Policy Checksum Monitor' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;33;40m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
rector:type-perfect: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Type\ Perfect 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Type\ Perfect 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Type Perfect' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
security:audit: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Security\ Audit 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Security\ Audit 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Security Audit' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[7;1;33m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
setup: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Setup 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Setup 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Setup' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;34m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Test Suite' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;37;44m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:arch: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Architecture\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Architecture\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Architecture Tests' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:browser: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Browser\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Browser\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Browser Tests' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36;47m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:coverage:js: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard JS\ Coverage 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet JS\ Coverage 2>/dev/null') ?: 'JS Coverage' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:coverage:pcov: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard PHP\ Coverage\ \(PCOV\) 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet PHP\ Coverage\ \(PCOV\) 2>/dev/null') ?: 'PHP Coverage (PCOV)' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;34m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
php -d error_reporting="E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_USER_DEPRECATED" -d memory_limit=1G -d xdebug.mode=off -d pcov.enabled=1 vendor/bin/pest --coverage --min=99.4 2>&1 || true
test:coverage:xdebug: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard PHP\ Coverage\ \(XDEBUG\) 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet PHP\ Coverage\ \(XDEBUG\) 2>/dev/null') ?: 'PHP Coverage (XDEBUG)' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"

php -d error_reporting="E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_USER_DEPRECATED" -d memory_limit=1G -d xdebug.mode=coverage -d pcov.enabled=0 -r "if (!extension_loaded('xdebug') || ini_get('xdebug.mode') !== 'coverage') { echo 'xdebug driver not available' . PHP_EOL; exit(0); } if (extension_loaded('pcov')) { echo 'Warning: pcov is loaded, Pest will prefer pcov over xdebug. Consider disabling pcov extension for xdebug coverage.' . PHP_EOL; }" && vendor/bin/pest --coverage --min=99.4 2>&1 || php -r "echo 'xdebug driver not available' . PHP_EOL;" || true
test:mutation: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Mutation\ Testing 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Mutation\ Testing 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Mutation Testing' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;33;46m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:profanity: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Profanity\ Check 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Profanity\ Check 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Profanity Check' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;31m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:type-coverage: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Type\ Coverage 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Type\ Coverage 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Type Coverage' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[7;1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
test:unit: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Unit\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Unit\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Unit Tests' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;34;47m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
php -d error_reporting="E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_USER_DEPRECATED" -d memory_limit=1G -d xdebug.mode=off -d pcov.enabled=1 vendor/bin/pest --testsuite=Unit,Feature --coverage --min=99
test:unit:js: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard JS\ Unit\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet JS\ Unit\ Tests 2>/dev/null') ?: 'JS Unit Tests' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
testsuite:core: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Core\ Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Core\ Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Core Test Suite' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[7;1;37m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
testsuite:full: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Full\ Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Full\ Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Full Test Suite' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;37;44m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
testsuite:heavy: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Heavy\ Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Heavy\ Test\ Suite 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Heavy Test Suite' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35;46m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
update:requirements: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Update\ Requirements 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Update\ Requirements 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Update Requirements' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;35m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
workflow:test: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Test\ Workflows 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Test\ Workflows 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Test Workflows' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"

bash -c 'if ! command -v act &> /dev/null; then printf "\033[0;31m✗ act is not installed\033[0m\n"; printf "\033[0;33mInstall it with: brew install act\033[0m\n"; echo "Or download from: https://github.com/nektos/act/releases"; exit 1; fi'

bash -c 'if ! docker info &> /dev/null 2>&1; then printf "\033[0;31m✗ Docker is not running\033[0m
"; printf "\033[0;33mPlease start Docker Desktop and try again\033[0m
"; printf "\033[0;36mOn macOS, you can start Docker Desktop from Applications or run: open -a Docker\033[0m
"; exit 1; fi'
bash -c 'printf "\033[0;32m✓ Docker is running\033[0m\n"; printf "\033[0;32m✓ Listing available workflows...\033[0m\n"; act --list 2>&1 | head -30 || true'
workflow:test:browser: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Test\ Browser\ Workflow 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Test\ Browser\ Workflow 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Test Browser Workflow' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
bash -c 'if ! command -v act &> /dev/null; then echo "\033[0;31m✗ act is not installed. Install with: brew install act\033[0m"; exit 1; fi'

bash -c 'act -W .github/workflows/browser-tests.yml --secret FLUXUI_PRO_USERNAME="${FLUXUI_PRO_USERNAME:-}" --secret FLUXUI_PRO_KEY="${FLUXUI_PRO_KEY:-}" --container-architecture linux/amd64 -P ubuntu-latest=catthehacker/ubuntu:act-latest --dryrun 2>&1 | head -30 || echo "\033[0;33mNote: Use --dryrun to preview, remove it to actually run the workflow\033[0m"'
workflow:test:lint: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Test\ Lint\ Workflow 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Test\ Lint\ Workflow 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Test Lint Workflow' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
bash -c 'if ! command -v act &> /dev/null; then echo "\033[0;31m✗ act is not installed. Install with: brew install act\033[0m"; exit 1; fi'

bash -c 'act -W .github/workflows/lint.yml --secret FLUXUI_PRO_USERNAME="${FLUXUI_PRO_USERNAME:-}" --secret FLUXUI_PRO_KEY="${FLUXUI_PRO_KEY:-}" --container-architecture linux/amd64 -P ubuntu-latest=catthehacker/ubuntu:act-latest --dryrun 2>&1 | head -30 || echo "\033[0;33mNote: Use --dryrun to preview, remove it to actually run the workflow\033[0m"'
workflow:test:pre-commit: php -r "\$banner = shell_exec('figlet -w 120 -k -f standard Test\ Pre-Commit\ Workflow 2>/dev/null') ?: shell_exec('figlet Test\ Pre-Commit\ Workflow 2>/dev/null') ?: 'Test Pre-Commit Workflow' . PHP_EOL; echo chr(27) . '[1;36m' . \$banner . chr(27) . '[0m' . PHP_EOL;"
bash -c 'if ! command -v act &> /dev/null; then echo "\033[0;31m✗ act is not installed. Install with: brew install act\033[0m"; exit 1; fi'

bash -c 'act pull_request -W .github/workflows/pre-commit.yml --secret FLUXUI_PRO_USERNAME="${FLUXUI_PRO_USERNAME:-}" --secret FLUXUI_PRO_KEY="${FLUXUI_PRO_KEY:-}" --container-architecture linux/amd64 -P ubuntu-latest=catthehacker/ubuntu:act-latest --dryrun 2>&1 | head -30 || echo "\033[0;33mNote: Use --dryrun to preview, remove it to actually run the workflow\033[0m"'
